/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few wispy clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
